LOCATION

Occupying a new total built up area of 18,110 sq.ft (extended by 8,000 sq.ft) this property now offers Seven bedroom suites (two of which are master bedrooms) all with spa inspired en-suite bathrooms and huge walk-in closets. A fully equipped Poggenpohl kitchen with high end appliances create a homely environment.
Situated right on the Polo Field which offers stunning views, the plot sits at 25,000 sq.ft.
Designed to an extremely high end modern standard the villa is a fully functional smart home with Audio Visual, Motion sensor lighting and iPad’s for smart home controls. The property also offers a fully fitted Cinema room and Gymnasium.
Moving outdoors the new owner will enjoy privacy in the garden while having a huge decked area for poolside entertainment and a sunken seating area with a fire pit. Guests can enjoy cooling down in the Dubai weather by taking a swim in the huge Infinity Swimming Pool or simply chilling in the Jacuzzi awhich is temperature controlled.']
